name: media-hoarder
description: Media Hoarder - THE media frontend for data hoarders and movie lovers
author: mk2k <npm@hoarder.software> (https://media.hoarder.software)

scripts.electron:build-linux-portable: npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=true && vue-cli-service electron:build --linux && mv dist_electron/linux-unpacked media-hoarder-portable && npx bestzip RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-linux-x64-portable.zip media-hoarder-portable && npx rimraf media-hoarder-portable && node set-portable --portable=false && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist_electron
scripts.electron:build-linux-setup: npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=false && vue-cli-service electron:build --linux deb appimage && mv dist_electron/*.deb RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-linux-x64.deb && mv dist_electron/*.AppImage RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-linux-x64.AppImage && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist_electron
scripts.electron:build-mac: npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=false && vue-cli-service electron:build --mac dmg && mv dist_electron/*.dmg RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-mac-x64.dmg && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist_electron
scripts.electron:build-win-portable: npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=true && vue-cli-service electron:build --win && mv dist_electron/win-unpacked media-hoarder-portable && npx bestzip RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-win-x64-portable.zip media-hoarder-portable && npx rimraf media-hoarder-portable && node set-portable --portable=false && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist_electron
scripts.electron:build-win-setup: npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=false && vue-cli-service electron:build --win && npx mv dist_electron/*.exe RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-win-x64-setup.exe && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist_electron
scripts.start: bash ./apply-hotfixes.sh && vue invoke electron-builder && vue-cli-service electron:serve
